attributes.additional_details: I would like to see the Government take proper action against this, especially if it is being encouraged by those who are standing for election.
attributes.background: It is high time, tactical voting was abolished, it is not fair for parties to manipulate the people of this country to have no choice at the polls.  What we have seen in the local elections must not be repeated in any future General Election.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about who to vote for are a matter for individual voters, not the UK Government or Parliament.
